scripts.postbuild: pnpm run copy-data && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*Schema.ts" "src/**/*.txt" "src/*.py" "data/**/*" dist && rimraf --glob 'copyfiles-*.done.build.log' && && npm run install-python-deps
scripts.install-python-deps: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync('python3 --version', { stdio: 'ignore' }); execSync('python3 -m pip install -qq -r requirements.txt', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch { try { execSync('python --version', { stdio: 'ignore' }); execSync('python -m pip install -qq -r requirements.txt', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch { console.log('Python not found, skipping...'); } }"
